title: Breakfast Burritos
description: The breakfast burrito, is a variety of American breakfast composed of breakfast items wrapped inside a flour tortilla burrito
text: The breakfast burrito can be prepared with myriad filling ingredients, such as eggs, ham, cheese, onion, peppers, bacon, Canadian bacon, potatoes, sausage, avocado, tomato, spinach, beans, and olives. breakfast burritos are often served smothered (covered with a chile sauce) or handheld (with chile sauce or chopped green chile inside). It is usually served heated up or cooked.

title: Smoky beans & baked eggs
description: ack in the nutrients with smoky beans and baked eggs. Great for a veggie family lunch or supper
text: 2 tbsp oil ,1 onion , chopped, 1 red pepper , sliced, 3 garlic cloves , crushed,2 tsp smoked paprika,  1 tbsp ketchup, handful of coriander , leaves picked   400g can chopped tomatoes,  2 x 400g cans black or pinto beans , drained , 4-6 eggs , depending on how hungry you are (adults may want 2 eggs each),

title: African Tea
description: this is page one,mzcn lafhdvfnzx,n ndkjvjfdslklznchvcvbdskkzskj
text: Combine milk, tea, and sugar in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. Wash the piece of ginger and smash it until juices begin to flow. Add the ginger to the milk-tea mixture when it begins to boil. Reduce the heat and let it simmer for 2-3 minutes. Strain and serve
